segments.text: To start with , may I know why you are interested in working for our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First of all , as far as I know , your company has had impressive records in business . Second , I want to enter the foreign trade field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What was your chief responsibility in your past work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am in charge of marketing activities in South-East Asia , for example , organizing trade conferences and arranging exhibitions .
segments.speaker: S2
